attributes.action: To make All social media platforms a safer place
attributes.additional_details:
Well at the Game platforms PlayStation, Xbox they managed to look after there subscribers they have the technology to protect players.
Tic tok , Facebook, Instagram took a leave out of there book.
attributes.background:
To change all the social media platforms. 
Stop all negativity from even being allowed on anyone’s post . They should take responsibility and look after there subscribers .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:

Require social media platforms to identify and remove all unsafe content.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710557
